snippet.title: The Bus | Official Teaser | Aerosoft
snippet.description:
Coming soon | https://store.steampowered.com/app/491540/The_Bus/

The Bus is the next generation of city bus driving simulation set in the capital of Germany, Berlin, on a realistic scale of 1:1. Transport passengers on different lines across the city with various busses. Manage your fleet and team up with other drivers online. 

For more news and information follow us:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Aerosoft​​
Twitter: https://twitter.com/aerosoftgmbh​​ 

#thebus​​ #tml​​ #aerosoft​​
